abstract: Former Kosovo Prime Min Ramush Haradinaj is detained at Slovenia airport by police acting on warrant from investigators in Serbia who want to hold him accountable for war crimes.
lead_paragraph: War crimes investigators in Serbia want to hold Former Prime Minister Ramush Haradinaj accountable for the killings of Serbs while he was a commander of Western-backed insurgents in the late 1990s.
snippet: War crimes investigators in Serbia want to hold Former Prime Minister Ramush Haradinaj accountable for the killings of Serbs while he was a commander of Western-backed insurgents in the late 1990s.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
